titleStmt.title: Of the reasonableness of Christian religion by H.H. D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Item at reel 187:2 incorrectly identified as Wing H570.
